steps.title: Basics
steps.description: What kind of data asset do you want to publish?

name.label: Title
name.help: Enter a concise title. You will be able to enter a more thorough description in the next step.

description.label: Description
description.help: Add a thorough description with as much detail as possible.
description.placeholder: e.g. Shapes of 23 common desert plants.

inLanguage.label: Language
inLanguage.help: Pick the language your data asset is for.

crowdsource.label: Do you want to crowdsource the creation of your asset?

steps.title: Asset Information
steps.description: Adding your asset files & describe it to help people discover it.

files.label: Files
files.help: Provide one or multiple urls to your asset files.

links.label: Asset Samples
links.help: If you want, you can provide multiple urls with sample files to better describe your asset. (IMPORTANT: this information will be public)

dateCreated.label: Creation Date
dateCreated.help: Select the date the asset was created, or was updated for the last time.

categories.label: Category
categories.help: Pick a category which best fits your data set.

tags.label: Tags
tags.help: Choose approiate tags labels to help people discover your asset.

steps.title: Licensing
steps.description: Give proper attribution for your asset.

license.label: License
options: PDDL: Public Domain Dedication and License

steps.title: Asset Pricing
steps.description: Let's set the pricing mechanism for your asset

price.label: Price
price.help: Enter the price of assets in Ocean tokens.

steps.title: Register
steps.description: You're almost there! We got all the required information. Now let's register your data asset.
steps.content: Here's a teaser of how your asset will be publihsed. After clicking the button below you will be asked by your wallet to sign this request.
